channel.title: Pages on Framescart Printing Services
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Framescart Printing Services

item.title: Shipping Policy
item.description:
1. Get free shipping on all over Rs. 1500 else standard shipping charges will be applied.
2. Item will be shipped within 2-5 working days based on stock availability.

If there is any conflict between this Shipping Policy and the Online Terms and Conditions, the Online Terms and Conditions will prevail and will apply in respect of all products sold through the FramesCart India website.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
We value your business and we know privacy is important to you. Accordingly, we have implemented this Privacy Policy to inform you of the information that we collect from you, how we collect it and what we do with it. By using this website you are accepting the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

What information do we save ? Here is the list of your details, we save with us when you place an order
1. Your name
2. Billing and Shipping Address
3. Phone Number
4. Email Address
5. Order Items and Details
6. Tracking Code and Name of Courier partner 7. IP Address from where order is placed

item.title: Return Policy
item.description:
We have a 7-day return policy, which means you have 7 days after receiving your item to request a return.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You’ll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.

To start a return, you can contact us at info@framescart.in Please note that returns will need to be sent to the following address: FramesCart Printing Services, Chandpur, Rajarhat, West Bengal, 700135

item.title: Terms and Conditions
item.description:
Overview

This website is operated by FramesCart India. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to FramesCart India. FramesCart India offers this website, including all information, tools and Services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.

By visiting our site and/ or purchasing something from us, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/ or contributors of content.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
We provide printing and gifting solutions

We provide any flat surface printing services however we have varities of printing job like photo framing, Jumbo printing, digial canvas, visiting card etc.

Screen Printing

Any flat surface screen printing done here with care.Creating art pieces is our passion. We believe the walls around us decorated with paintings and artworks speak of our character and life.

Non-Woven Bag Printing

We do personalized Non-Woven bag printing
